hotels.name: The Brando Resort
hotels.desc: Picture-perfect paradise with sunrise canoeing, private blessings, starlit dinners
hotels.longDesc: A secluded luxury resort offering sunrise canoeing, private Tahitian blessings, and romantic starlit dinners in the heart of French Polynesia.

hotels.name: The Brando Resort
hotels.desc: Marlon Brando's private island resort, luxury escape, exclusive paradise
hotels.longDesc: An iconic ultra-luxury resort on a private atoll offering total privacy and exceptional service for the world's most exclusive travelers.

hotels.name: InterContinental Tahiti Resort & Spa
hotels.desc: Beachfront luxury resort, lagoon access, water sports, spa facilities
hotels.longDesc: This stunning beachfront resort offers direct lagoon access, perfect for families wanting water activities, with excellent kids' clubs and easy snorkeling from the beach.

hotels.name: Sofitel Kia Ora Moorea Beach Resort
hotels.desc: Overwater bungalows, pristine beach, lagoon snorkeling, family pools
hotels.longDesc: Iconic overwater bungalows combined with beachfront accommodations make this an unforgettable family experience, with calm lagoon ideal for children's water play.
hotels.photoAttribution: Sofitel Kia Ora Moorea Beach Resort

hotels.name: Motu Beachfront Art Villas
hotels.desc: Budget-friendly guesthouse, local atmosphere, island views, family rooms
hotels.longDesc: A charming budget-friendly pension offering authentic island living with comfortable family rooms, perfect for travelers seeking genuine Polynesian hospitality without luxury prices.
hotels.address: Ara Tapu, Takitumu District, Cook Islands

hotels.name: Le Taha'a by Pearl Resorts
hotels.desc: Overwater bungalows, vanilla plantation tours, lagoon activities, spa treatments
hotels.longDesc: Exclusive island resort featuring overwater bungalows and unique vanilla plantation experiences, offering families an immersive cultural adventure with world-class amenities.

restaurants.name: Moko Caf√© Tahiti
restaurants.desc: Fine dining seafood, French Polynesian fusion, waterfront views, elegant ambiance
restaurants.longDesc: Upscale restaurant showcasing fresh local seafood and French-Polynesian cuisine with stunning waterfront vistas, ideal for special family dinners with refined atmosphere.
restaurants.address: FC6M+CQH, Rue Charles Vi√©not, Papeete 98714, French Polynesia

restaurants.name: Bloody Mary's Bora Bora
restaurants.desc: Casual beachfront dining, fresh fish, tropical drinks, laid-back vibe
restaurants.longDesc: Iconic beachfront restaurant famous for fresh grilled fish and tropical cocktails, offering a relaxed family-friendly atmosphere perfect for sunset dining with ocean views.

restaurants.name: Oasis Carrefour Arue
restaurants.desc: Local caf√©, fresh pastries, strong coffee, authentic breakfast spot
restaurants.longDesc: Charming local caf√© serving excellent fresh pastries and strong Polynesian coffee, perfect for a casual family breakfast before exploring the island's attractions.

restaurants.name: Restaurant Tiahura Chez Ir√®ne
restaurants.desc: Traditional Polynesian cuisine, local dishes, family-style dining, cultural experience
restaurants.longDesc: Authentic restaurant featuring traditional Polynesian dishes served family-style, offering children a genuine taste of island culture in a welcoming, casual environment.

restaurants.name: O Belv√©d√®re
restaurants.desc: Upscale French restaurant with panoramic views of Papeete and the lagoon, known for fine dining

restaurants.name: Holy D√©lices

restaurants.name: Snack Rotui
restaurants.desc: Casual beachside snack restaurant serving local dishes and fresh fish on Moorea

restaurants.name: Restaurant le Sunset
restaurants.desc: Beachfront restaurant in Moorea serving pizza, grilled fish and international cuisine with sunset views

experiences.name: Museum of Tahiti and The Islands
experiences.desc: Polynesian culture museum, traditional artifacts, art exhibitions, educational displays
experiences.longDesc: This comprehensive museum showcases Polynesian heritage through artifacts, art, and interactive exhibits, providing families insight into the fascinating history and traditions of the islands.
experiences.photoAttribution: Mus√©e de Tahiti et des √éles - Te Fare Manaha

experiences.name: Otemanu
experiences.desc: Scenic mountain trek, panoramic island views, challenging hike, nature adventure
experiences.longDesc: An exhilarating guided trek up Bora Bora's iconic peaks revealing breathtaking panoramic views of lagoons and neighboring islands, perfect for adventurous families seeking natural splendor.

experiences.name: Corallina Tours excursion baleine snorkeling Moorea Polynesie
experiences.desc: Guided snorkeling, colorful coral reefs, tropical fish, shallow water access
experiences.longDesc: Professional-guided snorkeling adventures showcase vibrant coral gardens and tropical fish in safe, family-friendly shallow waters perfect for children's first reef exploration.
experiences.photoAttribution: Corallina Tours excursion baleine snorkeling Moorea Polynesie

experiences.name: Public Beach
experiences.desc: Public beach on Moorea's northeast coast with white sand and calm lagoon waters, perfect for swimming and families

experiences.name: Tropical Garden
experiences.desc: Botanical garden with vanilla orchids, tropical fruits, and easy walking paths for kids

experiences.name: Belvedere Lookout
experiences.desc: Panoramic viewpoint overlooking Cook's and Opunohu Bays with easy photo stops

experiences.name: Plage de Tiahura
experiences.desc: Public beach on Moorea's northwest coast with shallow waters ideal for children and families

kidFriendly.name: Matira Beach
kidFriendly.desc: Pristine white-sand beach, calm waters, family facilities, shallow lagoon area
kidFriendly.longDesc: Matira Point's perfect crescent beach features pristine white sand, calm crystal-clear lagoon waters, and excellent family facilities, making it ideal for young children's beach play.

markets.name: Papeete Market
markets.desc: Vibrant open-air market, fresh produce, local crafts, tropical fruits, authentic experience
markets.longDesc: Bustling central market overflowing with colorful tropical fruits, fresh seafood, and handmade crafts, offering families an authentic sensory experience of Polynesian island life.

a.name: French Polynesia Family Paradise (8 Days)
a.description: Overwater bungalows, coral gardens, and vanilla-scented breezes ‚Äî this is the island escape where toddlers can safely wade turquoise lagoons while parents sip cocktails at sunset.
